title: Google I/O 2022 Recap: Everything you need to know from Google’s big tech event
content:
The first day of Google I/O 2022 is done and dusted, and boy is there so much exciting stuff to talk about. While Google I/O has traditionally remained a software-focused event, the story was a bit different this year. The new Pixel hardware stole the show this time around, as Google not only announced the

The post Google I/O 2022 Recap: Everything you need to know from Google’s big tech event appeared first on XDA.
description: We have rounded up the major announcement from Google I/O 2022. Here's everything you need to know from the event.
